jobs.title: Front-End Web Developer
jobs.description: Builds and styles websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Focuses on responsive design and interactive user interfaces.

jobs.title: Junior Web Developer
jobs.description: Assists in developing and maintaining websites or web apps. Works on front-end features, debugging, and small-scale projects under supervision.

jobs.title: Web Designer / UI Developer
jobs.description: Creates visually appealing and user-friendly website layouts. Translates design mockups into functioning web pages using HTML and CSS.

jobs.title: Email Developer
jobs.description: Codes responsive HTML emails and templates. Ensures compatibility across devices and email clients for marketing campaigns.

jobs.title: CMS Editor / Content Specialist
jobs.description: Manages and updates website content using a CMS. Formats pages, uploads media, and maintains site consistency using basic HTML and CSS.

jobs.title: Junior UX Engineer / Interaction Designer
jobs.description: Builds and tests interactive prototypes to improve user experience. Combines coding and design to make interfaces intuitive.

jobs.title: Marketing / Email / Landing Page Technologist
jobs.description: Develops and maintains marketing web pages, forms, and email templates. Uses HTML, CSS, and JS to support digital campaigns.

jobs.title: Website QA / Web QA Analyst
jobs.description: Tests websites for bugs, layout issues, and performance problems. Reports errors and verifies cross-browser compatibility.

jobs.title: Web Content Specialist
jobs.description: Edits, uploads, and manages web content. Ensures proper formatting, accessibility, and alignment with brand standards.

jobs.title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: Works on both front-end and back-end website features. Uses JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and basic server-side technologies like Node.js.

jobs.title: Junior Software Engineer (Front-End leaning)
jobs.description: Develops front-end components and integrates them into larger applications. Focuses on clean, scalable JavaScript code.

jobs.title: Technical Support Engineer (Web Apps)
jobs.description: Troubleshoots and resolves technical issues in web-based applications. Supports users and identifies bugs in HTML, CSS, or JS code.

jobs.title: SEO Specialist / Web Optimization Assistant
jobs.description: Improves website visibility and performance. Uses HTML structure, metadata, and analytics to optimize for search engines.

jobs.title: Web Production Assistant
jobs.description: Publishes and updates website content and assets. Ensures accuracy, accessibility, and layout consistency across pages.

jobs.title: WordPress / Theme / Plugin Junior Developer
jobs.description: Customizes and maintains WordPress themes and plugins. Uses PHP, HTML, CSS, and JS to enhance website functionality.
